{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-X |revision=(1GB) Rev 0.4 |price=129 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=Yes |availability=discontinued |est_release_date=08/2012 <!-- (20120808) --> |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=2.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=0.8 |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=Exynos 4412 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=PoP |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=7 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9514 |lan_speed=100M |an_ports=1 |addl_chips=Power management IC;Maxim;MAX77686;;1; ,,, Low Power Stereo Audio Codec;Maxim;MAX98090;;1; ,,, Integrated USB 2.0-compatible 3-port Hub;SMSC;USB3503A;;1; ,,, 1A PWM/VFM Step-down DC/DC Converter;Ricoh;RP505K331B;;1; ,,, 2-Bit Voltage Translator/Buffer/Repeater Isolator for I2C;Fairchild;FXMA2102L8X;;1; |flags=SDHC Card slot, eMMC module connector, Audio in/out (3.5mm), Micro HDMI out, power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;2010.12; |stock_os=Linux;3.6.0-rc1; }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-X}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/product-category/odroid-board/ Product page]
:RAM is LPDDR2 PoP with processor (@800MHz)
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB and 64GB available.
{{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ODROID ''ODROID'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://wiki.odroid.com/old_product/odroid-x_u_q/odroid-xq ''ODROID-X, X2, Q Hardware manual'' on '''ODROID Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2012/07/11/hardkernel-odroid-x-low-cost-exynos-4412-quad-core-cortex-a9-development-board/ ''HardKernel ODroid-X Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Samsung]]'' Exynos 4412 @1.4GHz :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A9) :GPU: Mali-400 MP4 @400MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, :eMMC module connector *RAM: 1GB (LPDDR2) @800MHz
===See also=== <!-- *[[ODROID-C0]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C1+]] - ''Amlogic'' S805 4-cores ARM Cortex-A5 CPU @1.5GHz *[[ODROID-C2]] - ''Amlogic'' S905 4-cores ARM Cortex-A53 CPU @2.0GHz *[[ODROID-GO]] - ''Espressif Systems'' ESP32 Dual Core LX6 @240MHz *[[ODROID-H2]] - ''Intel'' J4105 4-cores Celeron @2.5GHz *[[ODROID-HC1]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-HC2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-N2]] - ''Amlogic'' S922X 4-cores ARM Cortex-A73 @1.8GHz ::::::and 2-cores ARM Cortex-A53 @1.9GHz CPU *[[ODROID-U2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-U3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM Cortex-A9 @1.7GHz --> *[[ODROID-X]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.4GHz *[[ODROID-X2]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 4412 Prime 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A9) @1.7GHz *[[ODROID-XU]] - "Samsung" Exynos 5410 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @1.6GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.2GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU3 Lite]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @1.8GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.3GHz CPU *[[ODROID-XU4]] - ''Samsung'' Exynos 5422 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A15) @2.0GHz ::::::and 4-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) @1.4GHz CPU
